channel.title: Crackers
channel.description:
I'm wanting to add full cracker pullling, so can you help with these?
Where and how do I add object used on other player?
How do i make the phat/item random, and who gets it random?
thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2009, 04:05:53 pm[/size][hr]btw,317

item.title: Crackers
item.dc:creator: @deadly990 deadly990
item.description:
@deadly990 wrote:

so. there is a packet that is nearly exculsivly for crackers (i know of 2 other items that are item used on player) all you need to do is find that. and once you have found that just add a cracker spot something like if (itemid = crackers) {…} and in the … do something with misc.random so that it becomes random. note, i am not going to spoon feed you this over this forum, if you want a more in depth explination then pm me.

Read full topic
